name: Trapped (itch) (ShreyGandhi)
description:
Survival 3D Top-down shooter game. The player in curiosity enters a haunted area and gets trapped inside a house. The player needs to survive and kill all the zombies in the house and try to escape the house. There are two floors the player needs to find the path to reach the top of the house and leave house from there.

For the player controls, we have

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Mouse to rotate the player and mouse button 0 (Left mouse button) to shoot

And E to interact with some objects
